output.crosstab_text:
Among those who graduated ten years previously from first degree courses in English studies and who were working during the 2021-22 tax year, Education was the most common industry for all ethnicities.The industry with the largest range in proportions was Professional, scientific and technical activities, where Other ethnic group ethnicity graduates had the highest proportion and Black / African / Caribbean / Black British ethnicity graduates had the lowest proportion.

The industry with the largest range in median earnings was Administrative and support service activities, where Mixed / Multiple ethnic groups ethnicity graduates had the highest median earnings (46,400) and Black / African / Caribbean / Black British ethnicity graduates had the lowest median earnings (23,400). The group with the highest earnings was Mixed / Multiple ethnic groups ethnicity graduates who worked in the Professional, scientific and technical activities industry (median earnings of 51,100).
